questions.question: What is the chemical formula for the Ln-MOFs synthesized in the study?
questions.answer: [Ln(BTC)-(H2O)] · (H2O)0.5DMF

questions.question: Which lanthanide elements were excluded from the Ln-MOF synthesis, and why?
questions.answer: Pm was excluded due to its radioactivity.

questions.question: How does the magnetic alignment of Eu-MOFs compare to that of Tb-MOFs under a magnetic field?
questions.answer: Eu-MOFs align parallel to the field, while Tb-MOFs align perpendicular.

questions.question: What causes the macroscopic magnetic anisotropy in Ln-MOFs?
questions.answer: The macroscopic magnetic anisotropy in Ln-MOFs is attributed to the highly-ordered structure allowing the Ln-ions' molecular anisotropy to be summed according to the crystal symmetry.

questions.question: What effect does the removal and re-adsorption of solvent molecules have on the magnetic alignment of Ln-MOFs?
questions.answer: The removal and re-adsorption of solvent molecules can cause reversible switching between parallel and perpendicular alignments in Ln-MOFs.

questions.question: What is the relationship between the crystal symmetry and magnetic alignment in Ln-MOFs?
questions.answer: In tetragonal Ln-MOFs, the crystal symmetry dictates that the alignment is either parallel or perpendicular to the magnetic field, while in monoclinic Ln-MOFs, the alignments can become inclined to the field.

questions.question: What determines the direction of magnetic alignment in Ln-MOFs?
questions.answer: The direction of magnetic alignment in Ln-MOFs is determined by the easiest axis of molecular anisotropy, which depends on the species of Ln-ions and their coordination environment.

questions.question: Why do Eu-MOFs align parallel to the magnetic field?
questions.answer: Eu-MOFs align parallel to the magnetic field because their maximum principal magnetic susceptibility value (χmax) is along the crystallographic c-axis, which corresponds to the long axis of the crystal.

questions.question: How does the magnetic susceptibility of Ln-MOFs change with the species of Ln-ions?
questions.answer: The magnetic susceptibility of Ln-MOFs changes with the species of Ln-ions due to differences in their magnetic moments and anisotropy, which are influenced by the non-uniform distribution of electrons among the 4f orbitals.

questions.question: What role does the crystal field effect play in the magnetic properties of Ln-MOFs?
questions.answer: The crystal field effect influences the molecular magnetic anisotropy of Ln-ions by affecting their coordination configuration, which can lead to changes in the macroscopic magnetic alignments of Ln-MOFs.

questions.question: Can the magnetic alignment of Ln-MOFs be manipulated through chemical treatments?
questions.answer: Yes, the magnetic alignment of Ln-MOFs can be manipulated through de(re)-solvation treatments, which affect the coordination environment of Ln-ions and result in reversible switching of magnetic alignments.

questions.question: Is the magnetic alignment of Gd-MOF responsive to applied magnetic fields?
questions.answer: No, Gd-MOF shows no response to applied magnetic fields due to its magnetic isotropy.

questions.question: True or False: All Ln-MOFs exhibit the same type of magnetic alignment under a magnetic field.
questions.answer: False

questions.question: True or False: The magnetic alignments of Ln-MOFs are influenced by their crystallographic structures.
questions.answer: True

questions.question: True or False: The removal of solvent molecules always leads to a perpendicular magnetic alignment in Ln-MOFs.
questions.answer: False

questions.question: True or False: The magnetic susceptibility of Ln-MOFs is solely determined by the shape of the crystals.
questions.answer: False

questions.question: True or False: The magnetic alignments of Ln-MOFs are permanent and cannot be changed once set.
questions.answer: False

questions.question: True or False: The magnetic alignments of monoclinic Ln-MOFs are always inclined at the same angle to the magnetic field.
questions.answer: False

questions.question: True or False: The magnetic properties of Ln-MOFs are not affected by the coordination environment of Ln-ions.
questions.answer: False

questions.question: True or False: The magnetic alignments of Ln-MOFs can be rapidly realized in a few seconds under a low magnetic field.
questions.answer: True
